about_the_game:
MEET NYMERIA!

Age: 31 years old

Zodiac Sign: Scorpio

Preferences: Edged weapons, hunting in the Wasteland, gold.

Nymeria is strong-willed and fiercely independent, with no patience for anyone who dares to contradict her. In her world, there's only one correct opinion — and it's hers. She's tough, passionate, and has a knack for managing people. An unapologetic hedonist, she knows exactly what she wants and how to get it.

WHAT YOU GET

From now on, Nymeria will not only be your loyal companion but also your inspiring muse! She will always accompany you on the main screen with her dynamic animations and compelling dialogues.

By purchasing this DLC, you will get the Nymeria mascot! You can change your mascot at any time by opening your profile and selecting the "Mascot" tab.

In addition to the mascot, you will receive 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you will receive our eternal gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Nymeria
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Nymeria, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
